title: Local social perception of mining in Parauapebas and Canaã dos Carajás in the eastern Amazonia, Brazil
content:
Publication date: September 2024

Source: Resources Policy, Volume 96

Author(s): Valente José Matlaba, Jorge Filipe Dos Santos, José Aroudo Mota, Leon Nazaré Da Cruz, Thiago Leite Cruz, Leoni de Souza Belato, Eduardo Nicolau Demétrio Neto, Rafael Pompeu Dias, Charles Caldas Vilarinho, Diego de Souza Andrade, Sérgio Luis Cardoso Serrão, Válber de Almeida Pires
